description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Your mission is to defeat the lord on the top floor(Floor10) of the castle. Using skills of the ninja, Attack the enemy. Or, do not to be found by the enemy.
description.short: Your mission is to defeat the lord on the top floor(Floor10) of the castle. Using skills of the ninja, Attack the enemy. Or, do not to be found by the enemy.
